bio.p: Siyu Xiu received his bachelorâ€™s degree in pharmacy from Shandong First Medical University, China, in 2018. Currently, he is a master graduate student in medicinal chemistry at the School of Pharmaceutical Sciences, Shandong University, working under the supervision of Professor Xinyong Liu and Associate Professor Peng Zhan. His research interests focus on rational design, synthesis, and biological evaluation of novel potent inhibitors of influenza virus hemagglutinin.
